payload.question:
Architecture plan ready:

Components to create: src/components/settings/SettingsTabs.tsx, src/components/settings/ProfileTab.tsx, src/components/settings/UnitsTab.tsx, src/components/settings/ApprovalsTab.tsx, src/lib/version.ts
Components to modify: src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx, src/components/layout/MobileNav.tsx, src/components/layout/Sidebar.tsx, src/i18n/translations.ts, vite.config.ts
Version management: Read version from package.json and display with optional build timestamp using Vite environment variables (VITE_APP_VERSION from package.json and VITE_BUILD_TIME from build date). Create a utility function at src/lib/version.ts to encapsulate version logic.

Review the plan and approve to continue?
payload.title: Architecture Plan Review
